description: This is a Flutter source code file defining the ResultsScreen widget for displaying the results of a menu generation process. It includes UI elements such as headers, grids/list of result cards, and actions for saving or starting a new scan.

classes.name: ResultsScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying results, including a header, grid or list of result cards, and action buttons.

classes.name: _ResultsHeader
classes.description: Stateless widget to display a summary of the run, including success/error counts.

classes.name: _ResultsGrid
classes.description: Widget that displays the list of menu result items in a grid or list depending on screen width.

classes.name: _Pill
classes.description: Small UI component for showing labeled status indicators with icons and colors.

methods.name: _saveRun
methods.description: Asynchronous method to save the current run using PersistenceService, with loading state management and snack bar notifications.

methods.name: _newScan
methods.description: Method to navigate back to the initial screen for a new scan.
